definitions.text: a thin crisp slice of potato fried in deep fat
make wrinkles or creases on a smooth surface; make a pressed, folded or wrinkled line in
examples: crease the paper like this to make a crane

definitions.text: make brown and crisp by heating
(of something seen or heard) clearly defined
examples: the sharp crack of a twig
the crisp snap of dry leaves underfoot
crisp clear nights and frosty mornings

definitions.text: brief and to the point; effectively cut short
examples: a response so curt as to be almost rude
short and terse and easy to understand
